definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: He took the glass with the drops of medicine in it and again went up to the crib.
sentences.chinese: 他拿起一隻滴滿藥水的高腳杯，又向面前走來了。

sentences.english: Collins or goblet glass and garnish with lemon or orange slice.
sentences.chinese: 考林杯或高腳杯，用檸檬或橙片裝飾都可以。

sentences.english: It's, in fact, a broken goblet from the children's playhouse.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，它是孩子們遊戲房裏的壞了的高腳杯。

sentences.english: Ice tea is almost always served in a tall glass of ice.
sentences.chinese: 通常來講，冰茶都是放在有冰的高腳杯中賣的。

sentences.english: Pour into 4 tall glasses and serve immediately.
sentences.chinese: 用4個高腳杯裝，適宜馬上飲用。

sentences.english: The champagne was quaffed from huge golden goblets.
sentences.chinese: 香檳酒被從金色的高腳杯裏一飲而盡。

sentences.english: A tulip shaped glass on a stem.
The goblet was mantling with foam.
sentences.chinese: 這個高腳杯蓋滿了泡沫。

sentences.english: A single bar here might contain bits of a pharaoh's goblet and a conquistador's ingot.
sentences.chinese: 一根金條可能曾經是法老的高腳杯或征服者的財寶。

sentences.english: Site added six hand-cut crystal goblets, and paused.
sentences.chinese: 還有那六個手工水晶高腳杯也很別緻。

sentences.english: If you have the chalice hop on and ride it out of here.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有高腳杯就乘坐它離開這裏。

sentences.english: At the base of the goblet is an 18-karat gold bracelet with 1 carat of white diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 高腳杯的底部是一個鑲着1克拉白鉆的18K金圓環。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
Jiguan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
